attributes.action: provide free bus transport for all children to school to save road congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work at a small rural primary school, but still some 55 families drive to and from school every day.  If free buses were provided for all childern who live within 4 to 5 miles it would help both road congestion and global warming. For most walking is not an option - there are no pavements or lighting in or around the village.
